ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 import * from dw::core::Strings output application/json --- { "camelize" : camelize("customer_first_name"), "capitalizea" : capitalize("customer"), "capitalizeb" : capitalize("customer_first_name"), "capitalizec" : capitalize("customer NAME"), "capitalized" : capitalize("customerName"), "charCode" : charCode("Mule"), "charCodeAt" : charCodeAt("MuleSoft", 1), "dasherizea" : dasherize("customer"), "dasherizeb" : dasherize("customer_first_name"), "dasherizec" : dasherize("customer NAME"), "dasherized" : dasherize("customerName"), "fromCharCode" : fromCharCode(117), "ordinalizea" : ordinalize(1), "ordinalizeb": ordinalize(2), "ordinalizec": ordinalize(5), "ordinalized": ordinalize(103), "pluralize" : pluralize("box"), "singularize" : singularize("boxes") }
